title: Pseudonyms used by Donald Trump
added: {{Tweet|name=John Barron|username=barronjohn1946|date=Jan 8, 2021|text=Hello I am brand new to Twitter, what are you guys up to|ID=1347694753786200064}}

In January 2021, after the permanent suspension of Trump's personal Twitter account,<ref>{{Cite web|title=Permanent suspension of @realDonaldTrump|url=https://blog.twitter.com/en_us/topics/company/2020/suspension.html|access-date=2021-01-09|website=blog.twitter.com|language=en-us}}</ref> an account with the handle @barronjohn1946 was registered with the location “Not the White House” and including "Not Donald Trump" in the bio. The account is presumed to be satirical, but {{asof|2021|01|09|lc=true|df=US}}, has amassed more than 150 thousand followers and more than 836 thousand likes on its first tweet.<ref>{{Cite news|title=Satire Twitter account springs up under Donald Trump's pseudonym after ban|language=en-NZ|work=TVNZ|url=https://www.tvnz.co.nz/one-news/world/satire-twitter-account-springs-up-under-donald-trumps-pseudonym-after-ban|access-date=2021-01-09}}</ref>
